title: Department of Electrical Engineering
content:
[[File:|alt=Department of Electrical Engineering|thumb|Department of Electrical Engineering]]
Established as one of the major departments of the Institute, since its inception in 1951, the Department of Electrical Engineering is actively engaged in teaching and research. With modern laboratories and excellent members of faculty, the Department of Electrical Engineering offers two undergraduate programmes in electrical engineering and instrumentation engineering.
The HOD (Head of the Department) of Electrical Engineering Department is Pranab_K._Dutta .
Sensors, Signal Conditioning, Measurements and Instrumentation
Multivariable Control Systems, Periodic Control and Robust Control
Computational Medical Imaging, Smart Medical Devices, Machine Learning
Medical Image Informatics, Computer Vision, Machine Learning
Monitoring and Diagnostics of HV Power Apparatus
Modular Multilevel Converters, HVDC, Electric Drives
Department_of_Electrical_Engineering/Viva_Voce_Questions is the list of all the Viva Voce questions so far documented by us.
